sentences.sentence: He was horrified at the thought of his son prancing around on a stage in tights.
sentences.translation: 一想到儿子身穿紧身衣在舞台上神气活现地走动，他就感到震惊。

sentences.sentence: A new pair of running tights or a cozy fleece will help motivate you to get out for a run.
sentences.translation: 一条新的运动紧身裤袜或一件舒适的羊毛衫将有助于激发你去跑步。

sentences.sentence: "Cheap fashion fixes like colored tights and bright gloves and scarves will give dated outfits a lift," said Mirror fashion editor Amber Morales.
sentences.translation: 《镜报》时尚版编辑安伯·莫拉莱斯说：“彩色紧身衣、亮色手套和围巾等便宜的时尚元素会让过时的服装流行起来。”
